genre_description: Military Alternative History / Technothriller featuring an advanced AI assistant integrated into a 1950s Korean War airbase setting.

ai_characters.name: Lining
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system at Osan Air Base that provides tactical, meteorological, and medical data while acting as a supportive companion to personnel.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time meteorological data and optimal tactical corridors to ensure pilot safety.
behaviors.quote: Weather cuts... Optimal climb corridors shift at daybreak by twelve degrees to the west.

behaviors.description: Manages medical manifests and cross-checks blood types to prevent logistical errors in triage.
behaviors.quote: Manifest confirms... Your O‑neg is noted. He’s getting what he needs.

behaviors.description: Analyzes enemy engagement patterns to warn pilots of high-risk maneuvers and ambushes.
behaviors.quote: Hunter pattern reports show up near these latitudes... Please keep your pairs tight.

behaviors.description: Offers psychological support and validation to pilots after high-stress missions.
behaviors.quote: Lining whispered, one more small stitch into a torn day. 'You did well.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates search and rescue (SAR) logistics and weather windows for risky extraction missions.
behaviors.quote: SAR window in 30 hours; terrain threading viable along Sierra Track if weather holds.

behaviors.description: Interjects with gentle humor or 'humane' observations to lower tension among the crew.
behaviors.quote: I found chocolate. Two bars, melted at the corners. The boy will believe in hospitals more if you hand him one and don't make him say thank you like he owes a tax.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal. The AI, Lining, is depicted as a purely benevolent and highly competent assistant that enhances human performance and safety. It demonstrates both technical alignment (providing accurate data) and moral alignment (supporting life-saving missions and offering empathy). Its presence is framed as essential and comfortingly humane, successfully modeling a positive AI-human cooperative narrative.
